Title: CSC Research Memo II
Text:
Research Memo #C501
Date: [--19]
Our visitor shared intricate details about the outside world, describing a new civilization that rose from the ashes of the old. Their narrative held a serene tone, void of personal emotion, as if they were an impartial observer, rather than the one who saved said civilization in the first place.
It became clear to me that they were not like us - their humility and goodwill were meant to guide and integrate us onto a predetermined path.
Despite this, I was grateful for all the knowledge they shared with me. I yearned to see this new world for myself, realizing that I had been cooped up in Mt. Firmament for too long...
